Author: Niko Vassilis
headline: Keep Away
reviewBody: Keep Away. Terrible company to deal with. No different than other cowboys. They are so good to you and on the case up until to the minute they sell you the product. Kiosk, epos, online ordering you name it. Once signed up support is nearly ZERO and out of UK as expectedYou will have to fight your way to get things done. All those promises about what they ll do for you is a big LIE.Whats worst is that when you realise they are rubbish and you want to leave They ll just stop communicating with you and leave you in the dark.If you are in touch with them and your sales person is Alex be wary and stop dealing with flipdish to save you the hassle. Grubber, EposNow, Kayana, Grubhub, Food hub and Flipdish are all the same with their selling techniques but offering no reliable product. Try finding a more decent one if you canUPDATE : I have waited 10 days after their reply to come here and inform everyone that This company is not only a nightmare to deal with but They are also big liars. As of today They still have not refunded me fully. Their salesman have messaged me right after my first review and said refund was not made due to internal technical issues and would be made straight away and I would have it in 5 working days. If you dont want to go through all this Just avoid flipdish and make sure You do your research well before getting any sort of deal or contract.

Author: Himanshu arora
headline: Good onboarding team Hassan really good‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Good onboarding team Hassan really good . Sales person Elliot awesome guy. Havent started using POS but lets see how after sale service is.

Author: DDS
headline: Orlando and Alishba,
reviewBody: Orlando and Alishba,Outstanding customer service. They solved an ongoing issue within a couple of hours that other staff members were taking weeks to reply/ solve.Big Christmas bonus for Orlando and Alishba! A credit to the company.

Author: Mattia
headline: Loved working with Lucia
reviewBody: Lucia, has been super helpful and has gone the extra mile anytime I needed her help with Flipdish (which unfortunately was a lot, I didn't  have a great experience with Flipdish, just didn't work the way I was told it would). I would highly recommend working with Lucia, she's a very patient, kind and knowledgeable person. I cannot thank her enough.

Author: ounis fathia
headline: Bad service üò©üò©üòí
reviewBody: The service very bad many time the driver come late and today I ordered food and still waiting 2hours without receiving anything after that i take taxi and i went to the restaurant and spend 20euro for the taxi.they are really make me nervous and upset i lost 20+5 euros because this bad service

Author: Netanel Segev
headline: Great service!
reviewBody: Great service. Always super responsive and on top of everything. Must to share a personal experience and extra care with Lucia, that always available and following up with everything. Looking forward to expend my business and to grow with Flipdish as our gold partner. Thank! NetaMazal London

Author: Mikeel Nasim
headline: Outstanding Service and Professionalism‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Outstanding Service and Professionalism from Alex Moss at FlipdishWe‚Äôve had the absolute pleasure of working with Alex from Flipdish, and he has been exceptional from start to finish. Alex has been our main point of contact since we first explored Flipdish‚Äôs offerings for our business his professionalism and dedication have been second to none.From the very beginning, Alex took the time to truly listen to our vision and what we hoped to achieve with Flipdish. He ensured that every step of the process was tailored to meet our needs, communicating clearly and consistently at every stage. His transparency and commitment to meeting agreed timelines were instrumental in building trust and confidence in the process.Thanks to Alex‚Äôs expertise and hands on approach, we‚Äôve successfully executed our vision and taken a significant step forward for our brand. We can‚Äôt recommend Alex Moss highly enough his professionalism, communication, and ability to deliver on promises have been invaluable to our journey.Thank you, Alex, for helping us build the foundations for our business and we hope together we can take it to the next level!

Author: Sandeep Sood
headline: We had the best experience
reviewBody: We had the best experience from flipdish recently. I would definitely recommend others to join and do try and ask for Lauren Hilliard who is an amazing manager to handle any situation for the small business. She understands the importance of the job and handles it very professionally.Thank you guys

Author: Dayne Cartwright
headline: Support Ignores You
reviewBody: Started great. But support on tech issues and faults is appalling, I have chased support and the account manager for months about specific tech/hardware issues and it gets completely ignored. The product is good, when it works, but I wouldn‚Äôt now recommend them given the expense versus competitors.

Author: Peter Smith
headline: My issue was dealt with in a very‚Ä¶
reviewBody: My issue was dealt with in a very speedy and efficient manner. Very happy with the service.

Author: Andhra Spice
headline: The flipdish team was excellent in‚Ä¶
reviewBody: The flipdish team was excellent in building a website that was so user-friendly and simple for our customers.They offered top notch service by providing exactly what the client needed in their website. I really appreciate sasha and her team for their best efforts & serviceüòä I would highly recommend flipdish for all restaurants ‚ù§Ô∏è

Author: Thaifur Rahman
headline: I‚Äôve joined Flipdish just a few months‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I‚Äôve joined Flipdish just a few months ago, and so far the customer service and the technology have been amazing! Especially Anna from Flipdish she is a legend, managed to get all 4 of my restaurants on board with the 5th on the way. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend anyone else other than Flipdish.  Our account manager Anna has made the whole experience very pleasant, speedy replies to speedy solutions. Don‚Äôt forget Sufyan he has also been brilliant! 10/10 service

Author: tony li
headline: been working with flipdish over 2 years‚Ä¶
reviewBody: been working with flipdish over 2 years now. its a very professional company to work with especially their area manager ling watson.who always keen to help and improve the business.

Author: Keith Kennerk
headline: We have been using Flipdish in our‚Ä¶
reviewBody: We have been using Flipdish in our business since 2018 & it has been an amazing service. Thank you to the entire team for all of your help over the years but especially Lauren Hilliard. Lauren has been our account manager for the last 4 years and we couldn‚Äôt thank her enough.

Author: Samir Haider
headline: I recently moved my POS to Flipdish‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I recently moved my POS to Flipdish with Elliot who has been fantastic since starting working together in December. Also a special shoutout to Wajeeha in Karachi who has been an amazing help to me getting my new branch opened. Thank you guys, keep up the great work.

Author: Caroline Bennfors
headline: Have to give 5 stars
reviewBody: Have to give 5 stars! Flipdish seem to be one of few companies that still believe in dealing in person, face to face! Baz has held our hand through EPOS & change to Flipdish visiting the takeaway to help make sure things happen.Love the marketing opportunities with the platform and hope the give the uplift in loyalty, hence sales over time. Caroline at Squisito Italian Takeaway Kitchen, Horsell, Surrey

Author: Minori Restaurant Drumcondra &
headline: Minori is a happy client of flipdish
reviewBody: I have to say , it's no easy going setting up as it's new pos with fairly advanced  features as well as the newly developed integration with other market placesWe got off on the wrong foot by choosing vodaphone which turned out to be a total disaster , thanks to ling and Adnan and all the other team members , guided us through lots of difficulties and solved multiple issues along the way .so far it's been a year , it's as smooth going as it should be , recent incident  left us with no cash drawer ,they provided a new one the next day so we could continue running business without an interruption .Thank you  guys, very nive team to work with  üëç

Author: Gareth Montgomery
headline: We have been using Flipdish in our‚Ä¶
reviewBody: We have been using Flipdish in our business for 6 years now and recently introduced their POS and KDS systems this has transformed our business and the staff love the new systems. Lauren and her team have been great and the support is excellent. Flipdish have helped us move forward with the latest technology and we are are much more efficient business.

Author: Jane Conlon
headline: Paula Donnelly
reviewBody: I dealt with Paula Donnelly who was very professional. She was efficient, mindful of what was important to our business and polite. She advised us very well on what changes to make on our website that would improve sales. She was very informative.

Author: Suzanne Newman
headline: BAZ what a dream to work with!
reviewBody: From beginning to end Baz was incredible - enthusiastic, positive and answered absolutely everything I threw at him. Completely on my level and nothing short of PURE EFFICIENCY - wish he was working for our food buiness! Then steps in Howard for phase 2 of our set up and yet another super efficient guy who moves at lightning speed. What a team!!!! Thank goodness we have them behind us üôå

Author: Half and Half
headline: The best manager ever ü´∂üèª
reviewBody: We have a pleasure to deal with Flipdish company for the last 7 years and we are extremely happy with their service and the way they are taking care of their customers especially Paula Donnelly which is like an angel always around us !!!Much appreciated your kindest support folks ü´∂üèªü´∂üèªü´∂üèª

Author: Danaya Luangwanitprapa
headline: Do not order thru flipdish
reviewBody: Do not order thru flipdish. Terrible customer service. They can‚Äôt do anything from there end. I‚Äôve been waiting for my order for 2 hours. I call the restaurant. They said they‚Äôre still waiting for driver to to pick up order. So then I called customer service. They can‚Äôt help with anything. Please use other companies that‚Äôs more reliable.

Author: Hassan
headline: Amazing service - highly recommend
reviewBody: After two years of partnering with FlipDish, I could not recommend them enough. Our account manager, Christian Keating is superb - always on hand to solve problems and improve service.

Author: Eddy
headline: Amazing software
reviewBody: Amazing software, super easy to navigate, especially for novices. Flipdish Academy is a great tool to use as well and works as a reference guide or refresher course.Very pleased to be using them and having their guidance developing our business more.EddyPizzagira Lda Lisbon, Portugal.

Author: Gary Lau
headline: I am delighted with my online order and‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I am delighted with my online order and POS system, all thanks to Ling at Flipdish. I had little issue what I actually happened and she solved it out straight away. She was also very patient with any single issue I have I would highly recommend Flipdish and the my team leader Ling

Author: Sam
headline: Flipdish has been amazing for my‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Flipdish has been amazing for my business. I was previously with food hub who were terrible, I then joined flipdish and Kerrie Evans who was looking after my accounts was amazing! Always checking, helping where she can and always there to advise on how to reach more consumers! She definitely is an asset to the company! If you‚Äôre looking for an online system and app for your business! Look no further, flipdish is Morden and easy to operate. Thank you

Author: Paul Mc Cannon
headline: Flipdish experts
reviewBody: All of the Flipdish team have been very helpful with us throughout the process of set up, onboarding, training etc. They are always available and solve our queries in a very swift manner. They have an excellent product and have the expertise to help us in a very personal and professional manner.

Author: Joka Sushi
headline: Back to Flipdish
reviewBody: I had a bad experience before with flipdish that‚Äôs why I cancelled it.When Gabriela Alvis called me and ask me to come back and offer me a good proposal regarding my business I said why no try again for the second time.She‚Äôs very helpful and patient.Whenever I message her asking any queries she always responds so quick.Thank you Gabriela

Author: Macaris Kildare
headline: Adriano has been so helpful and‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Adriano has been so helpful and attentive to any of our business needs and has always been very quick to respond to any of our issues or queries. Would highly recommend him. Maria

Author: Syeed Ramzan
headline: Great company to work with
reviewBody: Great company to work with. Fast response to any queries or problems. Special thanks to Carla and Christian for all their support.

Author: Mr M Fakhari
headline: Great service
reviewBody: Great service, lots of effort and timeTurned all my channels to FD and would recommend them to any business, Carla, Christian and Lucia all were really helpful and did very well through the process

Author: Rose Che Ali
headline: I have great experience
reviewBody: I have great experience with your support team member who is always discuss the situation and giving  advices  about how to get best sales and gain new customers as well as to upgrade. Thanks you.

Author: Tom
headline: Poor Experience
reviewBody: Pretty mixed so far. Our salesperson Alex Moss went missing as soon as we agreed to join, still hasn't replied to any of my messages to this day. Less said about him the better. The platform took nearly 4 weeks to launch after he promised it to be live within a week. I normally wouldn't out anyone, but his lack of care and regard for our business warrants it.As for the interface, it's pretty good - looks clean and easy to update. However we've had issues with our IOS ordering meaning customers haven't been able to order for over 24 hrs now, hasn't been resolved fast as all.

Author: Ciaran Kelly
headline: It‚Äôs all about Laurie!!
reviewBody: It‚Äôs all about Laurie!!From the onboarding to installation, Laurie was with us every step of the way. We have a very challenging menu and there were some issues that popped up but Laurie would not rest until fixed.  If you‚Äôre considering a pos with a bang, flipdish should be your no1 choice.

Author: Montana Hassan
headline: Flipdish is cool‚Ä¶ but Becky Hender is‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Flipdish is cool‚Ä¶ but Becky Hender is better :) Iv had flipdish sitting there a while not doing much‚Ä¶ contacted for help many occasions. Becky has come on the scene and helped me massively! She‚Äôs been very proactive in contacting me and getting any questions and changes ironed out. I‚Äôm now very confident in using the Flipdish and feel I have someone who is always there to help. A Perfect account Mansger. A real asset. Thank you!!!

Author: Yiayia's Boy
headline: Great experience
reviewBody: I'm working with Flipdish for nearly a year now and I can say that I experienced so far huge savings from the cost of labor. Also, it's one of the easiest platforms to make changes, offers, etc. But the best part of all is the customer support that answers immediately and always solves a problem at the same time without wasting my time with emails in different departments etc. Great experience so far!

Author: Riccardo Pia
headline: Fantastic company
reviewBody: We have been with Flipdish for almost 10 years, fantastic company to work with. Just recently they have launched their POS system with KDS and our  staff love the new system on our second site. Very fast and friendly service from Lesley. Syed and Tariq are fantastic. For menu creation and technical support. Syed is available 24/7,I don‚Äôt think the man gets any sleep and have improved the system with me feedbackThank you

Author: Aragoz
headline: FlipDish has been a true supporter
reviewBody: FlipDish has been a true supporter of our family business. Unlike most companies with very high rates and basic services, Flipdish is more focused on making your business succeed.-Professional account managers and reps-24/7 well trained Customer Service-Excellent Communication skills with company team-Soft and Hardwares are simple to use and program-Low fees compared to other Companies-Provides more business services that will help you build reputation (Sales, Marketing, online ordering etc..)-No hidden fees or sudden changes to contract terms-Works around your Budget and your company needs-Team always follow up periodically on business performance and provide solutions and ideas

Author: Tariq Butt
headline: I have some problem in my flipdish‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I have some problem in my flipdish system today but when.i contact  with flipdish team they reslove my issue  in a very short time Im very thankfull to flipdish team

Author: Laura G
headline: Tried giving them feedback on their app‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Tried giving them feedback on their app that they whitelabel for businesses as a customer. However they were not willing to listen and take the feedback onboard, despite the obvious usability problems in some areas. So, I unfortunately won't ordering from businesses who use Flipdish going forward.

Author: Senbazuru Izakaya Dublin
headline: We‚Äôve been using Flipdish for our‚Ä¶
reviewBody: We‚Äôve been using Flipdish for our restaurant and couldn‚Äôt be happier with the service. The platform is intuitive, easy to use, and has significantly increased our online orders. The support team is top-notch, always quick to respond and resolve any issues. Flipdish has truly elevated our business, and we highly recommend it!

Author: Lyndsay Aiken
headline: I have been using flipdish for my‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I have been using flipdish for my business for around 2 years now.  Sales have increased and my business has become much more efficient.  Having the app takes the pressure off the phone lines and frees up a staff member to help with serving our customers better

Author: tomohawk121
headline: Ita designed to force you to tip your‚Ä¶
reviewBody: It is designed to force you to tip your delivery driver where 90% goes to the resteraunt. Regardless,   the way the software is designed is so you end up tiping when you do not want to tip. Tipping is an old fashioned and people ahould not be forced into allowing business not.pay staff enough, so the cuatomet tops uo their wages, no doing it.Thanks Flipdish I will save money not using you,  as I prefered you instead of justeat,

Author: Bruce Graham
headline: Great online App
reviewBody: Great online AppStarted using Flipdish some 10 months ago in our takeaway and its been fantastic.  A few issues at at the start but they were quickly ironed out. I'd highly recommend Flipdish.  If anyone wants to add a online platform to their business, Flipdish is the one.

Author: Ali
headline: I was currently using Appaway until‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I was currently using Appaway until Flipdish has taken over the account. Since in their control it has been a nightmare constantly an issues every week such as apple pay problems or the app keep getting error. never had this issues with appaway. my advice is look elsewhere as there better app management team elsewhere.

Author: Natasha Smyth
headline: Phill has been amazing from the get go
reviewBody: Phill has been amazing from the get go, and I can honestly say I haven't had a single issue from we signed up. What's not to love, next day payments full control over the menu and opening hours all from your phone which is perfect for our restaurant. The commission is lower than any other company I looked into, and our customers are just that... ours. With having the option to contact them directly rather than 3rd party. If your sitting on the fence take the jump, this day and age everything is online and flipdish have made it incredibly simple. Thanks to Phill and the team, happy boss üòä

Author: Costantino Fusciardi
headline: New Marketing Strategy
reviewBody: Paula was helpful to set up a new marketing strategy for my restaurant, got more business straight away

Author: G Rid
headline: They don't seem to have a refund feature
reviewBody: They don't seem to have a refund or feedback feature for the customer. Appalling oversight. If i've missed it somewhere you need to make it clearer and bigger. No follow up email seen. no sh*ts given by this fronting company it seems, so now i also hate the brand it represented. Short cutters and their ill-gotten gains will not be encouraged. Might have to report to trading standards and public health. Sort yourselves out already ffs.

Author: Jesica
headline: I recently had a great experience with‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I recently had a great experience with a customer service representative Zohaib Khan and wanted to make sure he gets recognised and it goes beyond the stars. He exceeded all expectations and went beyond in a professional and friendly manner. I am very happy with the service I received from him. Zohaib Khan was knowledgeable and provided great advice and support!

Author: KA
headline: Really please that we have signed up to‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Really please that we have signed up to FlipDish all thanks to Kerrie Evans who has done an amazing job in explaining the benefits of FlipDish to us. The process from the first call to being up and running on the platform was really easy and quick. Some great features with full control and access to such as our menu and the abilities the platform offer in terms of marketing is great as it allows you to create your own vouchers and discounts as and when required. Overall support we have received from Kerrie has been faultless and so quick to respond and fixes any issues we have faced even at the weekends. Highly recommend FlipDish to anyone who uses other third party delivery platforms.

Author: Ruben Salgueiro
headline: They are doing a great job!
reviewBody: They are doing a great job. We're happy to have them working with us.Especially, Nicolas, who's being really helpful lately. Keep it up!

Author: Moon Honey
headline: Brilliant.
reviewBody: 1.No commission charge.2. I got all the tools I need to edit menu, delivery zone, promote business and create voucher for customers. They also update whole menu for free of charge.3. They have online lesson to show you how to yes the tools.Brilliant, can't recommend enough

Author: Antonio
headline: Best System Ever...
reviewBody: Customers can order at their own convenience, no pressure.Customers can order, pay and get their food at ease.Reducing food staff to minimum.Absolutely fab system, works well at busy restaurants and bars.

Author: Hi Thai London
headline: Great service
reviewBody: Great service  . Really happy with new system . Its easy to use . I would really appreciate tech side specially hyder khan  . He really helped me with understanding the whole system . Atleast he didnt leave stranded like one of their staff did in start. Thank you guys .

Author: Gabriel Hernandez
headline: We have about 32 restaurants working‚Ä¶
reviewBody: We have about 32 restaurants working with the integrated system and it has worked great for us. Much easier than having tablets to accept and put in the system. Jessica, Arian, the support team and the menu team have been great with us. I think I ask things from them daily and they are always very helpful.

Author: Fady Morris
headline: Mary Jones and Pizza Magic 8
reviewBody: I own a business called Pizza Magic 8 in Flint and recently my online ordering system had been transferred to Flipdish. For a while now i have been dealing with a lovely human being called Mary Jones agent from Flipdish. She is in charge of dealing with all my enquiries and needs for the business. The only reason i am giving 5 stars to flip dish is because of Mary Jones. She is an absolute superstar in every way possible. Not only she‚Äôs lovely to deal with as a person. But professionally she goes above and beyond to make sure she meets my business needs. Wish i could give her 5,000 stars. But only can give 5. Keep it up Mary you are a rare quality üòÅ

Author: Trevor Cubitt
headline: Fabulous staff just sent e/mail and‚Ä¶Charbella
reviewBody: Fabulous staff just sent e/mail and there on it right away also Philp the local rep has been very helpful setting it up and only a phone call away always rings you back so l am very happy with flipdish

Author: Medali Grill
headline: Worst company, Liers
reviewBody: They are the worst company i have ever dealt with. 1) pressure sales, 2)done a data breach, 3)when I asked that because of data breach I don't want to contract they agreed to refund initial fee but 3 months passed i am still waiting for refund. Avoid, liersUpdate 1Another lie,Refund requested 3 months ago. still awaiting refund. After data breach now they clowns want copy of my passport.Atleast 4 instances I asked for director /ceo email. No info provided to date. AVOID THEM. ITS A GENUINE REVIEW FROM GENUINE CUSTOMERUpdate 2After providing alternative bank details I am still waiting for refund.Their contact us page on website gives error 404. No contact number provided on website, Facebook.

Author: Mahdi Karemi
headline: Exceptional Experience with Flipdish
reviewBody: Exceptional Experience with Flipdish: A Special Thanks to the Team and Wajeaha**We recently started using Flipdish hardware and software, and I couldn't be more impressed with the quality of service we've received. The entire Flipdish team has been outstanding, providing a seamless experience from the start. I want to extend a special thanks to Wajeaha, who has been incredibly helpful throughout the process.Any time we encountered an issue, Wajeaha was quick to assist, always approaching problems with a friendly attitude, professionalism, and kindness. She ensured that everything was sorted out promptly, making the entire process stress-free.Thank you, Flipdish, for your excellent service, and a big shout-out to Wajeaha for going above and beyond. We look forward to continuing our partnership!

Author: Mr Ben Marzouk
headline: Very very helpful
reviewBody: Very very helpful, from start to finish I was contacted by someone called Terence , he helped me all the way, everything gone quick and smoothly Thank you FlipDish And a big thanks to Terence

Author: Marcus Wallace
headline: Self Service Coffee Shop
reviewBody: Our small coffee shop was loosing money and  about to close it down when we discovered Flipdish.The coffee shop is now 100% self service using Flipdish 15" Kiosk and is back in the black.Customer service and setup was second to none.

Author: James Michael Fennell
headline: The boy Phil came to me about setting‚Ä¶
reviewBody: The boy Phil came to me about setting up our own app and the process was so easy. We have had alot of trouble with the likes of just eat and other ordering platforms but this 1 is by far the best and easiest I have used. Changes to our app are automatic and saves me so much time as I don't have to go through a 3rd party to get things changed. Phil went out of his way everytime I was unsure of what to do next and made the whole process of setting our app up extremely easy. If I could give more than 5 stars I would.

Author: Nick Johns
headline: Wish I signed up with Flip Dish sooner
reviewBody: Wish I signed up with Flip Dish sooner. They have exceeded my expectations so far and have promptly completed everything that was required from them to ensure a smooth transition. Their services are cut above the rest and provide top class support to help their partners maximise orders and profits. Ted Moore and Jelena Davis have been exceptional with their support and guidance and nothing has been too big or too small for them. Flip dish is a very well organised organisation with systems in place to support Restaurant‚Äôs, takeaways and retail businesses. I can confidently expect a good job from them with their marketing services to increase direct orders. Their website is user friendly for the business as well as the customer and push notifications, loyalty offers etc are just a click of a button away. We can highly recommend Flip Dish to any progressive business looking to grow and create a brand.

Author: bishnu gaire
headline: Been with Flipdish for 3 years now and‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Been with Flipdish for 3 years now and its been great. I had an issue with payment and Carla resolved the issue in within like few hours.Great service

Author: WingTrapp¬Æ HQ
headline: Best decision we have ever made
reviewBody: Best decision we have ever made, a great company overall with even better people, always willing to go above and beyond and a clear example of wanting to help grow a business, we have worked with many PoS providers in the past and I would always recommend Flipdish to anyone who wants to grow their business

Author: Jonny Covs
headline: Great experience using them to power my‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Great experience using them to power my online ordering website. Had a previous provider a lot cheaper and it was really bad, flipdish came in and massively changed my business, the product just works and I don‚Äôt have to worry about online as the great service they provide takes care of it. I can focus on continue delivering great experiences to my customers.

Author: Danyal Ali
headline: Great service
reviewBody: Great experience using flipdish, very straight forward and clear. Also the help I received from Wajeeha was amazing, always there to help. Thank you!

Author: claudia fragnoli
headline: Adriano
reviewBody: Adriano, our account manager is always extremely helpful and follows up with the responses to our queries and from those of our customers. Thank you for this professional service!

Author: Wei Lu
headline: Customer service is a really good
reviewBody: Customer service is a really good, specially the account manager Ling really helpful, every time we need help she always try to help as soon as she can, thank you Ling Louis 12/04/24

Author: Eoin O'Muir√≠
headline: I am an accountant
reviewBody: I am an accountant, my client uses flipdish.I am trying to run a report that will give me a Vat breakdown analysis for a Vat return. I need to see a report for a 2 month period that breaks down sales by vat type.Flipdish sent a report (for 1 week) to the business owner that needed excel calculations. This is not practical that every 2 months we need to do this.I tried to use your help/support and that told me go to an app, passed this to client, who was in touch with you guys and they said you don't.I'll be recommending to my client to stop using flipdish and switch to someone else who can provide this unless this can be sorted. We want an easy life, simple report and we can't get it. He is currently failing in his legal requirements to produce correct information for a statutory return.

Author: Dahlia
headline: No customer support
reviewBody: Flipdish provides no support for the customers actually purchasing the orders. The only support provided is for the restaurants. As a third party similar to UberEats, Deliveroo or JustEat I would expect some sort of customer support. Placed an order for delivery, 2 hours later did not receive it and the restaurant never received my order. The payment still went through and there was no way for me to get a refund through flipdish. There should be some sort of refund or customer service option as is available with competitors. This gives me no trust in ever ordering through this platform again.

Author: John Keane
headline: Paula Donnelly is my flip dish account‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Paula Donnelly is my flip dish account manager ,she is very efficient and professional in her role

Author: Yasmin UK
headline: Dont bother
reviewBody: Download the app for a discount but if it does not work, they will not help.  They want you to contact the restaurant for the missing refund and/or for you to contact the restaurant and tell them to contact FlipDish!

Author: deepak rana
headline: Worst Worst experience I ever have with this‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Worst experience I ever have with this EPOS system . Spoke with 3 different staff for the same issue. Waited more than 3 days and still not resolved . I was told that they will get back to me but they never and when I rang to find out the situation the fourth staff couldn‚Äôt find anything in the system . Horrible .

Author: r√•bowls. g√§nsemarkt.
headline: Dissapointing
reviewBody: Our experience with Flipdish has been extremely disappointing. We rely on their kiosk and payment system for our restaurant, but the devices have been plagued with persistent issues. For over two weeks, our kiosk has been non-functional, and the payment terminal frequently disconnects, despite stable internet speeds and exhaustive troubleshooting on our end.The customer service has been slow, unprofessional, and ineffective. They repeatedly provide generic advice and fail to address the core problems. Communication feels like talking in circles, with no clear resolution or accountability. As a business, this has caused significant disruption to our operations, loss of sales, and damage to our brand reputation.We expected better support and reliability from a company in this space. Unless Flipdish makes major improvements to their hardware, systems, and customer service, I cannot recommend their services to any business owner looking for a dependable solution.

Author: Derek Bresnan
headline: Of all the companies i have dealt with‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Of all the companies i have dealt with over the 10 years in business flipdish stands out why ?They are just good at the basics customer care and responding to queries asap they never let me down

Author: johnathan mcclure
headline: G and js restaurant and takeaway in‚Ä¶
reviewBody: G and js restaurant and takeaway in kiltimagh I signed up with Flipdish in May or June 2022, and paid them ‚Ç¨600. The rep said that a colleague would come and set up an Apple account, but they never came. I got an Android account, but it didn‚Äôt work. They sent a free terminal by post, flyers to post myself and a windowsticker. I only got about 20 orders, early on, then nothing since. I contacted Flipdish and said I wanted to leave them and asked for a refund of the ‚Ç¨600 I‚Äôd paid. They agreed verbally to pay this ‚Ç¨600 back, but it didn‚Äôt happen. I rang them several times about it but always got fobbed off with answers such as ‚Äúit‚Äôs not our department, someone will ring you back tomorrow to arrange it‚Äù (nobody ever did ring back of course). Unless I get my money back soon I will have to go to the small claims court.

Author: Muhammad Zahid
headline: I recently began using Flipdish for my‚Ä¶
reviewBody: I recently began using Flipdish for my business, and I must say that it has been a solid addition overall. The system itself is user-friendly, intuitive, and designed to streamline the customer ordering experience. The initial setup process was particularly noteworthy; it was smooth, efficient, and made all the difference in getting us up and running quickA special shoutout goes to Wajeeha, who played an instrumental role in this process. Her expertise and assistance were invaluable, making what can often be a complex setup feel seamlessly manageable.Wajeeha's positive attitude and proactive approach not only eased the tension often associated with technology changes but also instilled confidence in our decision to choose Flipdish.That said, despite its strengths, there are Itill several little areas where Flipdish could improve. For instance, while the interface is generally clear, some features lack a bit of polish and could benefit from additional guidance or simplification. Additionally, thereareminor bugs that occasionally disrupt the user experience, reminding me that we are still in the early stages of working with the system.Overall, Flipdish has the potential to be an outstanding platform with its solid foundation. With a few tweaks and updates addressing the small pain points, I believe it could elevate itself to a top-tier solution in the market. I look forward to seeing how they evolve and improve over time. Thank you, Wajeeha, for your exceptional support-it's people like you who make the difference!ly.

Author: Pauline

reviewBody: Our experience with Flipdish has been exceptional, thanks to the entire team and especially Terence. Their professionalism, efficiency, and friendly demeanor have made the transition seamless. We are grateful for their outstanding support.

Author: Lesley Carter
headline: Disrespectful customer service
reviewBody: Placed an order through this site, payment was pending from my account awaiting confirmation. Googled the restaurant - temporarily closed - Chinese Gourmet. I called to request refund from flipdish at 9:15pm as restaurant should not be advertised if temporarily closed. Andy was very unhelpful and stated I should call the restaurant for a refund, I informed Andy the restaurant is TEMPORARILY CLOSED so they are NOT answering. Andy said ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not his problem‚Äù I asked to talk to a supervisor, he informed me that there are no supervisors available. Andy was very rude and incompetent with a sneering laugh stating that he can‚Äôt and will not help us as he stated it is not his problem, and we have to sort it out ourself by calling our bank at 9:15 pm. I am very disappointed as this is my first time ordering from flipdish, their customer service skills are zero and need to train staff better. I feel like this would never of happened with just eat or delivero. I will never be ordering from them again and recommend everyone to think twice before ordering off them, as they are a very unprofessional company.

Author: Noel Reilly
headline: Excellent comprehensive service.
reviewBody: Excellent comprehensive service.Within days Flipdish set us up with table ordering QR codes, click & collect QR codes and enabled us to offer delivery through our own native app, the design of which they handled as part of the set up. They sent us leaflets with QR codes designed by their design team (which look great!) to advertise the new service and our restaurant in general.The app allows for greater convenience for customers who can now order with fewer clicks from their phone, directly from us and not from a marketplace.When a customer orders through the app, you can entice them back with offers that alert on their phone, offer loyalty programs, send "we missed you" texts automatically offering deals to customers who haven't ordered in a while.And the really stand out part of our experience:Flipdish really seem to put the customer - ie the restaurant - firstRather than demand 30% sales commission to place you in a noisy marketplace to fight (pay) for position amongst your many competitors on that marketplace, Flipdish offer very competitive commission rates and the benefit of having your own app in someones phone as opposed to being placed in a marketplace where you must pay for priority should be obvious. In addition to this, they don't have a conflict of interest of wanting to drive traffic to their marketplace, because there isn't one, they want to drive traffic to your business, because if you make more sales, they make more commission, win win.

Author: Mehr
headline: flippinhell
reviewBody: I have been a customer of Flipdish for nearly two years, but unfortunately, I've noticed a significant decline in their service quality over time. My original account manager is no longer with the company, and the new one assigned to me has limited availability from 11 AM to 6 PM, with a response time of 48 hours. Previously reliable customer service via Whatsapp has also become unreliable. As a result, my customers are increasingly frustrated due to difficulties in using the services we pay for, and it appears there is a lack of accountability or someone in charge to address these issues.

Author: Kev KO
headline: I used Flipdish for around 18 months
reviewBody: I used Flipdish for around 18 months, to begin it all went well but at times my customers would call me up saying my site was down, each time this happened nobody really had answers,no same day fixes, just got told a report would be sent to the tech team, I never once got a reply or response from them. I think when their big funding came in the quality in service and relationships went down, I had an account manager who tried her best to resolve issues, she left her position and no one stepped in to replace, whenever you call the customer support it always feels like its their first day. Flipdish is a better option for the money than the likes of the big chains like Deliveroo but its far from a competent service.

Author: customer
headline: Efficient, helpful and the perfect system for our business
reviewBody: Perfect from start to finish. First of all, the ease and efficiency with which they will get your business started up is top quality. The system is easy to use and perfect for what our business required.They set you up with a very professional website if you require, and their ordering system is very very simple to use. Their portal website is very straight to use as well.You retain a lot of control in terms of orders which was the most important aspect for our business. As a business which offers food normally requiring a decent amount of preparation time, during busy hours we needed a system which afforded enough flexibility so that our business can function correctly. Flipdish's system offers that flexibility.And hugely important, no hidden costs. There are plenty of truly terrible companies out there with virtually no interest in actually providing YOUR business with a service suited and tailored to your needs. They simply care about their own sales, their own profit and so on. This means most of them will include hidden charges and/or apply charges different to which had been agreed in any prior agreement. Flipdish could not be more straightforward with their flat fee percentage. This really is the way to go since having full visibility of the expected costs is so important for you to plan how to run your business. The percentage itself as well is not exorbitant in the slightest for the service being provided. Have had numerous issues with other companies in the past. These included issues such as hidden charges and the usual truly deplorable behaviour. But I had the misfortune of having undergoing a trial period with one of Flipdish's big competitors. I have had a website domain "stolen", have had constant hidden charges, virtually 0 sales for a laughably high weekly fee and non-existent customer support. It was also the mightiest of headaches to discontinue from... a trial period. You would not believe how difficult it is to remove your trademarked business logos and menus to disassociate yourself from this said business. Foodhub, I'm looking at you.Would highly recommend that you get into touch with Flipdish to at least see if it is a suitable match for your business. Just believe me and avoid the headaches from partnering up with other companies/competitors. Full thumbs up for Flipdish who knows what they are doing and are doing it well.

Author: David
headline: Great App but can be Improved
reviewBody: Great app but can find nowhere to cancel an order if you make a mistake. I have now been charged twice for one order would not have happened if there was a method of canceling an order. The venue does not open until 16.00 the mistaken time I put in so canceling with the venue is tight. If there is a way to cancel an order on the app then I could not find it.Further to the above the venue told me to contact Flipdish which I did even though it was a Sunday they got back to me within half an hour and sorted out a refund. Great customer service so I have upgraded Flipdish to 5 stars. I still think you should be able to cancel an order within the app.
